channel.title: Question
channel.description: i have a server (not my creation) but how do i set it up like what is a supporter, carrier or what ever, please help (place to run a server from, and how do i get it so i can click runserver.bat) im a brand new NEWBY so any help would be nice, Thanks SONG

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

I think i know what you mean, i’m not sure what you mean how do you click on runserver.bat though :S
Rather simple, once you have downloaded a source there should be a file called “runserver” which obviously runs your server, but many of them have changed now, on the “compile” file, since mod tharoak made the perfect compiler.
Press r then enter on the compiler file.

================================
Hope this helped, if not feel free to pm me.

Read full topic
